thread.title: Katy Perry Sings Chained to the Rhythm at Grammy Awards 2017 - Katy Perry's Grammy Awards Performance
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Sings Chained to the Rhythm at Grammy Awards 2017 - Katy Perry's Grammy Awards Performance

author: Rachel Torgerson
title: Katy Perry Sings Chained to the Rhythm at Grammy Awards 2017 - Katy Perry's Grammy Awards Performance
text: Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Getty Over the sleeve of her right arm, Katy wore a sparkly pink and white armband that read "PERSIST," a reference to the now-infamous comment Mitch McConnell made about Elizabeth Warren last week. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But she didn't stop there. Pinned to the left level of her blazer, Katy made her final political outfit choice — a Planned Parenthood pin. Getty "She was warned. She was given an explanation. Nevertheless, she persisted."So must we all. https://t.co/JXROGHPNkH — Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) February 8, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Katy's outfit was just the tip of the iceberg — her entire performance was political and it ended with a powerful image of the American Constitution in the background. Getty She can probably expect a tweet from Trump after this! Get non-boring fashion and beauty news directly in your feed. Follow Facebook.com/CosmoBeauty . Follow Rachel on Twitter and Instagram .
